task_description: Thread Builder - Multi-tweet composition interface with individual and aggregate scoring

patterns.state_management: TinyBase - use setRow() to init, useCell() to read, useSetCellCallback() to update. Auto-persists to localStorage.
patterns.component_structure: Radix UI Card components with Tailwind CSS. Keep state in TinyBase not useState. Use nullish coalescing for defaults.
patterns.scoring_system: Modular scoring with separate files (engagement, quality, hooks). calculateScore() is main entry point.
patterns.drag_drop: Use @dnd-kit library with DndContext + SortableContext + useSortable(). Requires PointerSensor + KeyboardSensor for accessibility.

existing_implementations.description: Single-tweet scorer exists with TinyBase state, Radix UI components, and modular scoring system. Tab-based navigation in App.tsx.
